description: go.tools/go/types: handle p.x with p of type P *S

messages.text:
Hello adonovan@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go.tools

LGTM

https://codereview.appspot.com/10459044/diff/4003/go/types/lookup.go
File go/types/lookup.go (right):

https://codereview.appspot.com/10459044/diff/4003/go/types/lookup.go#newcode42
go/types/lookup.go:42: //           providing LookupField and LookupMethod as well.
My guess is that most clients won't know what they're looking for.

https://codereview.appspot.com/10459044/diff/4003/go/types/lookup.go#newcode58
go/types/lookup.go:58: //           never what one wants, anyway.
Agreed (though a quick code search turned up a number of them).

https://codereview.appspot.com/10459044/diff/4003/go/types/lookup.go
